SEARCH
Package src.game.map

Class Network

java.lang.Object
src.game.map.Network
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Network extends Object implements Serializable
A class to represent a Network of Nodes can be serialized for game saving
Author:
devinlinux
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Network

      public Network(int NUM_NODES)
      Constructor to make a new Network
      Parameters:
      NUM_NODES - the number of nodes (cities) in this Network

  • Method Details

    • connect

      public void connect(int u, int v, PathNode.PathType type)
      Method to add an edge (path) to the Network
      Parameters:
      u - the starting node (city) of the new edge (path)
      v - the ending node (city) of the new edge (path)
      type - the type of edge (path) (land or sea)

    • connect

      public void connect(CityNode u, CityNode v, PathNode.PathType type)
      Method to add an edge (path) to the Network using CityNodes
      Parameters:
      u - the starting CityNode of the new edge (path)
      v - the ending CityNode of the new edge (path)
      type - the type of edge (path) (land or sea)

    • computeDistanceBetween

      public int computeDistanceBetween(int start1, int start2, PathNode.PathType type1, int end1, int end2, PathNode.PathType type2)
      Method to find the number of edges between a start and an edge (represented by start and end nodes) Uses a breadth-first search pathfinding algorithm
      Parameters:
      start1 - the first node associated with the first edge
      start2 - the second node associated with the first edge
      type1 - the type associated with the first edge
      end1 - the first node associated with the second edge
      end2 - the second node associated with the second edge
      type2 - the type associated with the second edge
      Returns:
      the number of edges between a start and end edge including the end edge, but excluding the start edge. Or -1 if no path is found

    • computeDistanceBetween

      public int computeDistanceBetween(PathNode start, PathNode end)
      Method to find the number of PathNodes between a start and an end PathNode Uses the above implementation of the method using the ids of the cities associated with the provided PathNodes
      Parameters:
      start - the start PathNode
      end - the end PathNode
      Returns:
      the number of PathNodes between the start PathNode and the end PathNode including the end, but not the start. Or -1 if no path is found

    • fread

      public static Network fread(String networkPath, String citiesPath)
      Library (static) method to load a Network from a file with CityNodes (cities) The first non comment line must be the number of nodes in the Network From there you can connect nodes using u invalid input: '<'-> v invalid input: '<'-> t
      Parameters:
      networkPath - the path to the file containing the Network
      citiesPath - the path to the file containing the CityNodes (cities) of the Network
      Returns:
      the Network created by the file

    • fwrite

      public static void fwrite(String path, Network network)
      Library (static) method to write a Network to a file
      Parameters:
      path - the path to the file to write to
      network - the Network to write to the file
